data.comment: The match is underway in Grozny.
The match is underway in Grozny.
Can Grosny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Goal! Grosny have got their heads in front thanks to a Odise Roshi strike.
Great play from Ravanelli to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Grosny have a dangerous throw-in.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Dinamo Moscow go level at 1-1 through Konstantin Rausch in Grozny.
That's a fine assist from Maximilian Philipp.
Throw-in high up the field for Grosny in Grozny.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Grosny in their own half.
In Grozny Dinamo Moscow attack through Sergey Parshivlyuk. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
Free kick for Grosny in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Akhmat-Arena.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Evgeny Kharin (Grosny) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Grosny.
Grosny to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Grosny will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Dinamo Moscow.
Grosny are pushing forward but Vladimir Iljin's finish is wide of the goal.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Felipe Vizeu of Grosny gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Free kick for Grosny in their own half.
Grosny are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sergey Parshivlyuk (Dinamo Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
Grosny pushes forward through Roland Gigolaev, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow's Toni Sunjic attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Grosny at Akhmat-Arena.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Grozny.
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half has come to a close in Grozny.
Ravanelli is booked for the home team.
Vitaly Meshkov has blown to start the second-half.
Grosny have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Grosny attack but Wilker Angel Romero's header doesn't find the target.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Grosny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Wilker Angel Romero (Grosny) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Dinamo Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Grosny's half?
Dinamo Moscow have been given a penalty...
Rizvan Utsiev for Grosny has been booked by Vitaly Meshkov and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead thanks to a penalty from Maximilian Philipp.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Grosny's half.
Odise Roshi for Grosny drives towards goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the away team a throw-in.
Grosny to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Grosny are coming forward and Rizvan Utsiev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow's Nikolay Komlichenko misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Grosny at Akhmat-Arena.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Grosny.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Grosny throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a throw-in for Grosny, close to Dinamo Moscow's area.
Igor Shalimov (Grosny) is making a first substitution, with Andres Ponce replacing Felipe Vizeu.
Can Grosny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Corner awarded to Grosny.
Throw-in for Grosny in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Free kick for Grosny in their own half.
Can Grosny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Nikolay Komlichenko for Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Grosny.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Grosny have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Dinamo Moscow's Konstantin Rausch gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Grosny at Akhmat-Arena.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Grosny throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Zaurbek Pliev is replacing Konstantin Rausch for Dinamo Moscow at Akhmat-Arena.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Ball safe as Grosny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick in a good position for Grosny!
Dinamo Moscow needs to be cautious. Grosny have an attacking throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow's Dmitri Skopintsev is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Grosny territory.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Grosny.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
Grosny push forward at Akhmat-Arena and [62] gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined [60] defence.
Grosny have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Can Grosny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Vitaly Meshkov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Maximilian Philipp with Kirill Panchenko. This is the second substitution made today by Kirill Novikov.
Grosny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Grosny.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Grosny's Bernard Berisha has been booked in Grozny.
Bernard Berisha is replacing Ravanelli for the home team.
Grosny's Evgeny Kharin breaks free at Akhmat-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
Grosny's Vladimir Iljin breaks free at Akhmat-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
Kirill Novikov is making the team's third substitution at Akhmat-Arena with Sylvester Igboun replacing Sebastian Szymanski.
Dmitri Skopintsev of Dinamo Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Goal! Dmitri Skopintsev extends Dinamo Moscow's lead to 1-3.
Sylvester Igboun with an assist there.
Free kick Grosny.
Grosny to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Goal! Denis Glushakov pulls one back for Grosny to make it 2-3.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Free kick for Grosny in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Grosny in their own half.
[49] for [50] gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Grosny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov blows to end the match. The final score is 2-3.
Grosny make their third substitution with Ablaye Mbengue replacing Roland Gigolaev.
Odise Roshi for Grosny has been booked by Vitaly Meshkov and receives a first yellow card.
At Akhmat-Arena, Nikolay Komlichenko has been yellow-carded for the away team.
